name: Java Job Scheduler
short_description:
FireMeUp Scheduler is a simple Java scheduler that can be integrated within your application in a very simple way.

The library is so simple and can be used in Small and Medium scale projects, and can be used if you need to schedule jobs of the following format:

- Jobs that run every INTERVAL of time.
- Jobs that run every DAY, WEEK, BI_WEEK, MONTH, BI_MONTH, YEAR in a specific hour/minute/second.
- Associating more than one job to be run and triggered with the same time configuration.
- Having more than a scheduler with different triggers and jobs assoications.
- Register/Unregister triggers freely.
- Enable/Disable a scheduler freely.
- To integrate your code just implement the Job interface and put your code in the execute method, register your job into a trigger, and register the configured trigger into a FireMeUpScheduler object.

Project source: https://github.com/husseincoder/FireMeUp-Scheduler/
summary: Yet another Simple Java Job Scheduler
